column4: hi guys - probably stupid question, but how can i always have latest packages (e.g. i dont want program X v 1.1, i want program X 1.2b)?
Ubuntu doesn't do that.  Ubuntu has frozen versions per release (1.1 will always be 1.1, plus bux fixes).  If you want that, you should maybe think about debian.
It's offtopic for here, and you don't need to repeat yourself anyway.
